Engineering Leadership with USDS' Lisa Chung 💪🏾💻🇺🇸

May 17, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • usds
  • digital service
  • govtech
  • procurement
  • hiring
  • culture

United Stats Digital Services Engineering Director Lisa Chung joined us to talk engineering culture, hiring diversity and inclusion, and vendor best practices. We had the chance to sit down and learn from her in March as she was taking on this leadership role.
